title: Mario Kart

replies.body: I used to be a god in the wii version but I dont play it anymore sry :p
replies.body_tagged: I used to be a god in the wii version but I dont play it anymore sry :p

replies.body:
Oh man Mario Kart.

I played it so much as a kid, it's almost gotten to the point where I knew the tracks with my eyes closed ;p Definitely takes the fun out things.

I haven't really tried out any of the newer versions since the Wii though, there's been some pretty neat things that I think would be cool to try out.
